About.title: About Green-AI
About.subtitle: Your intelligent partner for revolutionary plant care. We combine the power of AI and IoT to create the perfect environment for your plants to thrive.
About.feature1Desc: Enter a plant name and our AI, powered by the Gemini API, generates the optimal growing conditions, including thresholds for temperature, light, and soil moisture.
About.feature2Desc: Upload a photo of your plant, and our AI will analyze it to identify potential diseases and suggest effective remedies to bring it back to health.
About.feature3Desc: Connect an ESP32-CAM device to monitor your plant's environment live. Get real-time data on temperature, gas levels, moisture, and light.
About.feature4Desc: Have a question? Our multi-lingual AI chatbot is available 24/7 to provide expert answers on any agriculture-related topic.
